articles.author: Clothilde Goujard
articles.title: EU charges Elon Musk’s X for letting disinfo run wild - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The tech mogul’s platform is the first to get hit with charges under new EU social media law.
articles.content: The European Commission oversees X and two dozens of the world's largest online platforms including Facebook, YouTube and others. The EU executive's probe into Musk's firm opened in December 2023 and… [+1502 chars]

articles.title: Pioneering UK microchip maker bought by Japanese conglomerate - BBC.com
articles.description: Graphcore was once considered one of the country's most promising start-ups, with a £2bn valuation.
articles.content:
British artificial intelligence (AI) chip firm Graphcore - once considered a potential rival to market leader Nvidia - has been bought by a Japanese conglomerate.
